body:
SELECT c/uid/value as composition_uid 
FROM EHR e[ehr_id/value=$ehr_id] 
CONTAINS COMPOSITION c[openEHR-EHR-COMPOSITION.report-result.v1] 
CONTAINS OBSERVATION j[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.laboratory_test_result.v1] 
CONTAINS (CLUSTER d[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.specimen.v1] and CLUSTER i[openEHR-EHR-CLUSTER.system.v0]) 
WHERE c/archetype_details/template_id/value='Lab_result_report_stockholm.v2' 
AND j/protocol[at0004]/items[at0094]/items[at0062]/value/value = $RID 
AND i/items[at0002]/value/id=$LIS
AND j/protocol[at0004]/items[at0094]/items[at0063]/value/value = $LID
AND d/items[at0015]/value/value=$time 
ORDER BY d/items[at0015]/value/value DESC
